Español Crime Inside Ag Idaho Today Moscow Murders 7 Investigates Regional Boise State Football Wildfires 7's Hero KTVB Student News Viewpoint 7Cares **2025 St. Jude Dream Home Giveaway: Watch live Wednesday on KTVB** BOISE, Idaho — The 2025 St. Jude Dream Home Giveaway has arrived. One lucky winner is set to secure a brand new home, with several other prizes up for grabs on Wednesday evening on KTVB Channel 7. The 2,100 square-foot home in Star features three bedrooms and two bathrooms.Berkeley Building Company built the2025 St. Jude Dream Homeand has an estimated value of $750,000. Anxious ticket buyers can watch the St. Jude Dream Home Giveaway special starting at 6 p.m. Wednesday, followed by winner announcements during the live giveaway show at 6:30 p.m. on KTVB Channel 7,KTVB+ on Roku, Apple TV and Amazon Fire TV, andKTVB.COM. Live results will unveil the winners of the additional prizes, including a 2025 Ford truck, courtesy of Ford Idaho Stores, as well as four club seats to a Boise State football game and a $10,000 shopping spree at Mor Furniture for Less. RELATED:Get a look inside the 2025 St. Jude Dream Home and learn more Proceeds from the raffle go directly to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, which researches potential cures for childhood cancers and other life-threatening illnesses, and treats children at no cost to their families. All 31,777 tickets were sold after going on sale for $100 each on April 23. The 2025 home in the Oaklawn Community is the 13th St. Jude Dream Home to be built by Berkeley Building Company, who is notorious for its signature secret rooms with high-end amenities.
